thread.title: Blackberry revives classic keyboard phone - BBC News
thread.title_full: Blackberry revives classic keyboard phone - BBC News

title: Blackberry revives classic keyboard phone - BBC News
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Blackberry revives classic keyboard phone 26 February 2017 Last updated at 00:18 GMT A new Android-powered Blackberry with a physical keyboard has been unveiled by Chinese phone-maker TCL Communication. 
The company now licenses the brand for its devices, after Blackberry decided to outsource the development and manufacture of its smartphones. 
TCL's Nicolas Zibell told the BBC's Chris Foxx that he hoped to revive the brand with "strong products". Related Topics
